problemAwareness.headingText: The Hidden Cost of Poor Analytics and Inefficient Systems
problemAwareness.paragraphText: Many businesses lose up to 40% of ad spend due to inaccurate tracking and inefficiencies. Teams are overwhelmed with manual tasks and confusing data. Time and money are wasted without actionable insights.
points: Missed Opportunities: Poor insights lead to underperforming campaigns.
Lost Hours: Teams are bogged down by manual processes.
Stalled Growth: Without clarity, scaling feels impossible.
secondaryListItems: Optimize ad spend for maximum ROI
Automate repetitive tasks, saving hours of work
Make data-driven decisions for consistent growth

dreamOutcome.card1Content: Clearly see which ads work and which don't, allowing you to make informed decisions instantly.
dreamOutcome.card2Content: Automate repetitive tasks and free up your team's time for strategic initiatives and creative problem-solving.
dreamOutcome.card3Content: Make data-backed decisions effortlessly, ensuring every move you make is optimized for success.

offerDetails.headerDescription: A complete system designed for businesses looking to grow faster with less effort.

offerItems.title: Tracking Audit Blitz
offerItems.description: Identify gaps in your current tracking systems and implement advanced solutions for 95% accuracy.
benefits: Comprehensive analysis of your existing tracking setup

Verification and testing of new tracking systems

offerItems.description: Custom dashboard providing instant clarity on ad performance, ROI, audience behavior, and campaign effectiveness—all in one place.
benefits: Live performance metrics for all your ad campaigns

offerItems.title: Integration Masterclass
offerItems.description: Seamlessly unify platforms like Google Analytics, Facebook Ads Manager, and CRMs. Eliminate redundancy with expert guidance.
benefits: Step-by-step integration of major marketing platforms
Custom API connections for unique tech stacks
Data flow optimization to eliminate redundancies
Training on maintaining and troubleshooting integrations

offerItems.description: Hands-on tools and templates to automate your workflows. Access to a dedicated support team for troubleshooting.
benefits: Personalized automation strategy for your business
Implementation of time-saving workflow automations
Access to a library of pre-built automation templates
24/7 support from our team of automation experts

offerItems.title: Strategy Optimization Sessions
offerItems.description: Monthly 1:1 calls to analyze data and adjust strategies for continuous improvement and growth.
benefits: Monthly deep-dive into your performance metrics
Actionable insights and recommendations
A/B testing strategies for continuous improvement
Long-term growth planning and goal setting

objectionHandling.sectionTitle: Still Unsure? Here's Our Triple Guarantee

guarantees.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantees.description: We're so confident in our system that we offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you don't see measurable improvements in 30 days, we'll work with you until you do—or refund your investment.

guarantees.title: Double ROI Guarantee
guarantees.description: We guarantee that you'll at least double your return on ad spend within 90 days of implementing our system. If not, we'll continue working with you free of charge until you achieve this result.

guarantees.title: Time-Saving Guarantee
guarantees.description: We promise you'll save at least 20 hours per month through our automation systems. If you don't see this time savings within the first 60 days, we'll provide an additional 3 months of support at no extra cost.
